data.text: Dance, music, art, and literature are an important part of the culture of any country.
Music which is played on instruments is called instrumental music.
Music which is produced by human voice is called vocal music.
Many verses by our poets have been set to music and sung as ghazal, geet, and qawwali.
Architecture is the craft of designing and constructing buildings.
Churches are built with long hall and a tower.
Mosques are designed with domes, minarets and courtyards.
Leva is a folk dance of the Makranis of Balochistan.
The tribes in the Kalash valley near Chitral have their own folk dances.
Luddi and bhangra are two popular dances of the Punjab region.
Khattak is a dance performed by male dancers with swords.
Leva is a folk dance of the Makranis of Balochistan.
The jhoomar is a popular dance in Sindh.
The tribes in the Kalash valley near Chitral have their own folk dances.
